verses.verse: To the chief <S%H5329>Musician<s%>, A <S%H4210>Psalm<s%> or <S%H7892>Song<s%> of <S%H1732>David<s%>. Let <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H6965>arise<s%>, let his <S%H341>enemies<s%> be <S%H6327>scattered<s%>: let them also that <S%H8130>hate<s%> him <S%H5127>flee<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> him.

As <S%H6227>smoke<s%> is driven <S%H5086>away<s%>, so drive them <S%H5086>away<s%>: as <S%H1749>wax<s%> <S%H4549>melteth<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H784>fire<s%>, so let the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> <S%H6>perish<s%> at the <S%H6440>presence<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%>.
But let the <S%H6662>righteous<s%> be <S%H8055>glad<s%>; let them <S%H5970>rejoice<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H430>God<s%>: yea, let them <S%H8057>exceedingly<s%> <S%H7797>rejoice<s%>.

<S%H7891>Sing<s%> unto <S%H430>God<s%>, sing <S%H2167>praises<s%> to his <S%H8034>name<s%>: <S%H5549>extol<s%> him that <S%H7392>rideth<s%> upon the <S%H6160>heavens<s%> by his <S%H8034>name<s%> <S%H3050>JAH<s%>, and <S%H5937>rejoice<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> him.
A <S%H1>father<s%> of the <S%H3490>fatherless<s%>, and a <S%H1781>judge<s%> of the <S%H490>widows<s%>, is <S%H430>God<s%> in his <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H4583>habitation<s%>.

<S%H430>God<s%> <S%H3427>setteth<s%> the <S%H3173>solitary<s%> in <S%H1004>families<s%>: he bringeth <S%H3318>out<s%> those which are <S%H615>bound<s%> with <S%H3574>chains<s%>: but the <S%H5637>rebellious<s%> <S%H7931>dwell<s%> in a <S%H6707>dry<s%> land.
O <S%H430>God<s%>, when thou wentest <S%H3318>forth<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> thy <S%H5971>people<s%>, when thou didst <S%H6805>march<s%> through the <S%H3452>wilderness<s%>; <S%H5542>Selah<s%>:

The <S%H776>earth<s%> <S%H7493>shook<s%>, the <S%H8064>heavens<s%> also <S%H5197>dropped<s%> at the <S%H6440>presence<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%>: even <S%H5514>Sinai<s%> <S%H2088>itself<s%> was moved at the <S%H6440>presence<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%>, the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>.
Thou, O <S%H430>God<s%>, didst <S%H5130>send<s%> a <S%H5071>plentiful<s%> <S%H1653>rain<s%>, whereby thou didst <S%H3559>confirm<s%> thine <S%H5159>inheritance<s%>, when it was <S%H3811>weary<s%>.
Thy <S%H2416>congregation<s%> hath <S%H3427>dwelt<s%> therein: thou, O <S%H430>God<s%>, hast <S%H3559>prepared<s%> of thy <S%H2896>goodness<s%> for the <S%H6041>poor<s%>.
The <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H5414>gave<s%> the <S%H562>word<s%>: <S%H7227>great<s%> was the <S%H6635>company<s%> of those that <S%H1319>published<s%> it.
<S%H4428>Kings<s%> of <S%H6635>armies<s%> did <S%H5074>flee<s%> <S%H5074>apace<s%>: and she that <S%H5116>tarried<s%> at <S%H1004>home<s%> <S%H2505>divided<s%> the <S%H7998>spoil<s%>.

Though ye have <S%H7901>lien<s%> among the <S%H8240>pots<s%>, yet shall ye be as the <S%H3671>wings<s%> of a <S%H3123>dove<s%> <S%H2645>covered<s%> with <S%H3701>silver<s%>, and her <S%H84>feathers<s%> with <S%H3422>yellow<s%> <S%H2742>gold<s%>.
When the <S%H7706>Almighty<s%> <S%H6566>scattered<s%> <S%H4428>kings<s%> in it, it was white as <S%H7949>snow<s%> in <S%H6756>Salmon<s%>.
The <S%H2022>hill<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> is as the <S%H2022>hill<s%> of <S%H1316>Bashan<s%>; an <S%H1386>high<s%> <S%H2022>hill<s%> as the <S%H2022>hill<s%> of <S%H1316>Bashan<s%>.

Why <S%H7520>leap<s%> ye, ye <S%H1386>high<s%> <S%H2022>hills<s%>? this is the <S%H2022>hill<s%> which <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H2530>desireth<s%> to dwell <S%H3427>in<s%>; yea, the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> will <S%H7931>dwell<s%> in it for <S%H5331>ever<s%>.

The <S%H7393>chariots<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> are twenty <S%H7239>thousand<s%>, even <S%H505>thousands<s%> of <S%H8136>angels<s%>: the <S%H136>Lord<s%> is among them, as in <S%H5514>Sinai<s%>, in the <S%H6944>holy<s%> place.

Thou hast <S%H5927>ascended<s%> on <S%H4791>high<s%>, thou hast led <S%H7628>captivity<s%> <S%H7617>captive<s%>: thou hast <S%H3947>received<s%> <S%H4979>gifts<s%> for <S%H120>men<s%>; yea, for the <S%H5637>rebellious<s%> also, that the <S%H3050>LORD<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> might <S%H7931>dwell<s%> among them.
<S%H1288>Blessed<s%> be the <S%H136>Lord<s%>, who <S%H3117%H3117>daily<s%> <S%H6006>loadeth<s%> us with benefits, even the <S%H410>God<s%> of our <S%H3444>salvation<s%>. <S%H5542>Selah<s%>.
He that is our <S%H410>God<s%> is the <S%H410>God<s%> of <S%H4190>salvation<s%>; and unto <S%H3069>GOD<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> belong the <S%H8444>issues<s%> from <S%H4194>death<s%>.

But <S%H430>God<s%> shall <S%H4272>wound<s%> the <S%H7218>head<s%> of his <S%H341>enemies<s%>, and the <S%H8181>hairy<s%> <S%H6936>scalp<s%> of such an one as goeth on <S%H1980>still<s%> in his <S%H817>trespasses<s%>.
The <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H559>said<s%>, I will bring <S%H7725>again<s%> from <S%H1316>Bashan<s%>, I will bring my people <S%H7725>again<s%> from the <S%H4688>depths<s%> of the <S%H3220>sea<s%>:
That thy <S%H7272>foot<s%> may be <S%H4272>dipped<s%> in the <S%H1818>blood<s%> of thine <S%H341>enemies<s%>, and the <S%H3956>tongue<s%> of thy <S%H3611>dogs<s%> in the same.
They have <S%H7200>seen<s%> thy <S%H1979>goings<s%>, O <S%H430>God<s%>; even the <S%H1979>goings<s%> of my <S%H410>God<s%>, my <S%H4428>King<s%>, in the <S%H6944>sanctuary<s%>.

The <S%H7891>singers<s%> went <S%H6923>before<s%>, the players on <S%H5059>instruments<s%> followed <S%H310>after<s%>; <S%H8432>among<s%> them were the <S%H5959>damsels<s%> playing with <S%H8608>timbrels<s%>.
<S%H1288>Bless<s%> ye <S%H430>God<s%> in the <S%H4721>congregations<s%>, even the <S%H136>Lord<s%>, from the <S%H4726>fountain<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>.

There is <S%H6810>little<s%> <S%H1144>Benjamin<s%> with their <S%H7287>ruler<s%>, the <S%H8269>princes<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> and their <S%H7277>council<s%>, the <S%H8269>princes<s%> of <S%H2074>Zebulun<s%>, and the <S%H8269>princes<s%> of <S%H5321>Naphtali<s%>.
Thy <S%H430>God<s%> hath <S%H6680>commanded<s%> thy <S%H5797>strength<s%>: <S%H5810>strengthen<s%>, O <S%H430>God<s%>, that <S%H2098>which<s%> thou hast <S%H6466>wrought<s%> for us.
Because of thy <S%H1964>temple<s%> at <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> shall <S%H4428>kings<s%> <S%H2986>bring<s%> <S%H7862>presents<s%> unto thee.

<S%H1605>Rebuke<s%> the <S%H2416>company<s%> of <S%H7070>spearmen<s%>, the <S%H5712>multitude<s%> of the <S%H47>bulls<s%>, with the <S%H5695>calves<s%> of the <S%H5971>people<s%>, till every one <S%H7511>submit<s%> himself with <S%H7518>pieces<s%> of <S%H3701>silver<s%>: <S%H967>scatter<s%> thou the <S%H5971>people<s%> that <S%H2654>delight<s%> in <S%H7128>war<s%>.
<S%H2831>Princes<s%> shall come <S%H857>out<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>; <S%H3568>Ethiopia<s%> shall soon stretch <S%H7323>out<s%> her <S%H3027>hands<s%> unto <S%H430>God<s%>.
<S%H7891>Sing<s%> unto <S%H430>God<s%>, ye <S%H4467>kingdoms<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%>; O sing <S%H2167>praises<s%> unto the <S%H136>Lord<s%>; <S%H5542>Selah<s%>:

To him that <S%H7392>rideth<s%> upon the <S%H8064>heavens<s%> of <S%H8064>heavens<s%>, which were of <S%H6924>old<s%>; lo, he doth send <S%H5414>out<s%> his <S%H6963>voice<s%>, and that a <S%H5797>mighty<s%> <S%H6963>voice<s%>.
<S%H5414>Ascribe<s%> ye <S%H5797>strength<s%> unto <S%H430>God<s%>: his <S%H1346>excellency<s%> is over <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, and his <S%H5797>strength<s%> is in the <S%H7834>clouds<s%>.

O <S%H430>God<s%>, thou art <S%H3372>terrible<s%> out of thy holy <S%H4720>places<s%>: the <S%H410>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> is he that <S%H5414>giveth<s%> <S%H5797>strength<s%> and <S%H8592>power<s%> unto his <S%H5971>people<s%>. <S%H1288>Blessed<s%> be <S%H430>God<s%>.
